EmailTemplate.name: Notify Patients on Appointment Booking
EmailTemplate.subject: Appointment Booking Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
«Today» Dear «Pat_FullName»,
This is a reminder that your appointment is scheduled on «Appt_Date» at «Appt_Time» for a(n) «Event_name».
If you cannot make this appointment, please call our office at «Prac_Phone» at least 24 hours prior to this appointment. We would be happy to reschedule your appointment for a more convenient time. Your medical well-being is important to us !!
Sincerely, The Staff and Physicians at «Prac_Name»
